body_html:
The instructions only specify the packages needed for the tutorials, not the extra packages that are also needed to run the tests.

Please read https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#why-do-i-get-import-errors-in-python-when-i-try-to-use-caffe2 and https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#null__how-do-python-installations-work before changing your PYTHONPATH. You probably should not change your PYTHONPATH.

Since this issue is actually two issues, let's keep this one about the tutorial question. Please open a new issue about "cannot import caffe2_pb2" if you cannot find the answer in the links above.

Since this issue is actually two issues, let's keep this one about the tutorial question. Please open a new issue about "cannot import caffe2_pb2" if you cannot find the answer in the links above.
body:
The instructions only specify the packages needed for the tutorials, not the extra packages that are also needed to run the tests.

Please read https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#why-do-i-get-import-errors-in-python-when-i-try-to-use-caffe2 and https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#null__how-do-python-installations-work before changing your PYTHONPATH. You probably should not change your PYTHONPATH.

Since this issue is actually two issues, let's keep this one about the tutorial question. Please open a new issue about "cannot import caffe2_pb2" if you cannot find the answer in the links above.
